turkish_example_sentence: Biz bu büyük inşaat projesinde çalışsak aylık gelir elde ederiz.
english_example_sentence: If we were to work on this large construction project, we would earn monthly income.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы мы работали над этим крупным строительным проектом, мы бы получали ежемесячный доход.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Biz bu büyük inşaat projesinde ______ aylık gelir elde ederiz.
